/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the sidewalk, providing a sweeping view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few scattered clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky contrasting with the gray and white of the buildings.
